title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Programme de Lutte contre la Pauvreté Rurale par l'Appui aux Filières

description.narrative: Key programme objectivesThe programme's goal is to improve the incomes and living conditions of the target group, women and young people in particular. Its specific objective is to increase, in a sustainable manner, the target group's access to the added value that will be created through the development of the seven value chains. Policy and institutional objectivesPolicy dialogue is an integral part of the programme's design and future implementation. The Government will participate in the value chain working groups set up under the programme. This will allow for a public discussion with the Government of such issues as pricing policy, import and export taxes, subsidies, quality norms, and laws and regulations.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Programme de Lutte contre la Pauvreté Rurale par l'Appui aux Filières

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
